Welcome
Alienum phaedrum torquatos nec eu, vis detraxit periculis ex, nihil expetendis in mei. Mei an pericula euripidis, hinc partem ei est. Eos ei nisl graecis, vix aperiri consequat

About Merts
Contact Us
Best Soul Food In Charlotte
Mert’s Heart & Soul has been bringing joy & soul food in Charlotte, NC for over two decades. As a result of that we have been voted as the top soul food restaurant in Charlotte multiple times.
Guy Fieri from The Food Network’s Diners Drive-Ins & Dives said  “When you come to Charlotte North Carolina, you gotta try some Low Country and he hears that Mert’s is the Joint to try it at. Our Shrimp & Grits, Southern Fried Chicken, Killer Collard Greens & Soul Roll are World Renowned.
Our menu
Click Here
Comfort Food For The Soul
Are you looking for a Charlotte dining experience that captures the essence of Southern comfort food? Our staff creates a comforting and enjoyable space for our dining guests. Enjoy delicious comfort food with flavorful spices, like our famous Southern fried chicken, catfish, and signature Soul Rolls & cornbread. Get ready to savor the taste of the South!
Coming Soon
Mert”s Location
214 North College Street
Charlotte NC 28202
Opening hours
ROI NOW MARKETING LLC.

Mert's Heart & Soul – Uptown Charlotte's World Renowned Soul Food

gtag("set","linker",{"domains":["mertscharlotte.com"]});
gtag("js", new Date());
gtag("set", "developer_id.dZTNiMT", true);

window._googlesitekit = window._googlesitekit || {}; window._googlesitekit.throttledEvents = []; window._googlesitekit.gtagEvent = (name, data) => { var key = JSON.stringify( { name, data } ); if ( !! window._googlesitekit.throttledEvents[ key ] ) { return; } window._googlesitekit.throttledEvents[ key ] = true; setTimeout( () => { delete window._googlesitekit.throttledEvents[ key ]; }, 5 ); gtag( "event", name, { ...data, event_source: "site-kit" } ); };

function setREVStartSize(e){
//window.requestAnimationFrame(function() {
window.RSIW = window.RSIW===undefined ? window.innerWidth : window.RSIW;
window.RSIH = window.RSIH===undefined ? window.innerHeight : window.RSIH;
try {
var pw = document.getElementById(e.c).parentNode.offsetWidth,
newh;
pw = pw===0 || isNaN(pw) ? window.RSIW : pw;
e.tabw = e.tabw===undefined ? 0 : parseInt(e.tabw);
e.thumbw = e.thumbw===undefined ? 0 : parseInt(e.thumbw);
e.tabh = e.tabh===undefined ? 0 : parseInt(e.tabh);
e.thumbh = e.thumbh===undefined ? 0 : parseInt(e.thumbh);
e.tabhide = e.tabhide===undefined ? 0 : parseInt(e.tabhide);
e.thumbhide = e.thumbhide===undefined ? 0 : parseInt(e.thumbhide);
e.mh = e.mh===undefined || e.mh=="" || e.mh==="auto" ? 0 : parseInt(e.mh,0);
if(e.layout==="fullscreen" || e.l==="fullscreen")
newh = Math.max(e.mh,window.RSIH);
else{
e.gw = Array.isArray(e.gw) ? e.gw : [e.gw];
for (var i in e.rl) if (e.gw[i]===undefined || e.gw[i]===0) e.gw[i] = e.gw[i-1];
e.gh = e.el===undefined || e.el==="" || (Array.isArray(e.el) && e.el.length==0)? e.gh : e.el;
e.gh = Array.isArray(e.gh) ? e.gh : [e.gh];
for (var i in e.rl) if (e.gh[i]===undefined || e.gh[i]===0) e.gh[i] = e.gh[i-1];
var nl = new Array(e.rl.length),
ix = 0,
sl;
e.tabw = e.tabhide>=pw ? 0 : e.tabw;
e.thumbw = e.thumbhide>=pw ? 0 : e.thumbw;
e.tabh = e.tabhide>=pw ? 0 : e.tabh;
e.thumbh = e.thumbhide>=pw ? 0 : e.thumbh;
for (var i in e.rl) nl[i] = e.rl[i]<window.RSIW ? 0 : e.rl[i];
sl = nl[0];
for (var i in nl) if (sl>nl[i] && nl[i]>0) { sl = nl[i]; ix=i;}
var m = pw>(e.gw[ix]+e.tabw+e.thumbw) ? 1 : (pw-(e.tabw+e.thumbw)) / (e.gw[ix]);
newh =  (e.gh[ix] * m) + (e.tabh + e.thumbh);
var el = document.getElementById(e.c);
if (el!==null && el) el.style.height = newh+"px";
el = document.getElementById(e.c+"_wrapper");
if (el!==null && el) {
el.style.height = newh+"px";
el.style.display = "block";
} catch(e){
console.log("Failure at Presize of Slider:" + e)
//});
};

s.async = true;

embedder.parentNode.insertBefore(s, embedder);

else window.addEventListener("load", asyncLoad, false);
})();
